originalText.text: Noemi is an amazing attorney! she was very clear about her availability despite being busy. She took the time to thoroughly review my documents and provided me with her honest opinion. I really appreciated how responsive she was and that she didn't keep me waiting long for a response. Highly recommend her!

I really appreciated how responsive she was and that she didn't keep me waiting long for a response. Highly recommend her!

originalText.text: If you're in need of legal assistance don't walk... RUN to Solomon & Baez. Not only is Drew a great lawyer but he's proven to be a great person. He was so easy to work with and exceeded all my expectations. I direct everyone in need his way. 10/10 experience, I'd give him 1000 stars if it were possible 5 doesn't do him justice. The experience is up to you as the client. Drew empowers you to decide how involved you'd like to be. I was able to trust him with everything. He advocated for me at every turn and again achieved a win on my behalf. Do yourself a favor and hire Drew!

originalText.text: Working with Salomon & Baez law was such an easy & swift process. Salomon had great communication skills, I was always in the loop with anything involving my case and any questions or concerns I had, he was always one phone call away. Not to also mention we fought & won! Thank you Salomon & Baez Law! Whenever I need a lawyer I will only call you. Top 2 & not 2!!!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Salomon & Baez to handle your legal matters. The partners are consummate professionals who will always do what is in their client’s best interest and provide the highest level of service. I have personally had a great experience working with them and will continue to seek their guidance and services in any future matters.

originalText.text: Noemi's expertise in drafting contracts and providing business advice is unmatched. Her deep understanding of business law, coupled with a meticulous eye for details, has proven invaluable in safeguarding clients' interests and mitigating potential risks. Her clear and concise advice, always grounded in thorough legal analysis, has been pivotal in making sound business decisions. Working with Noemi, you can expect a trusted guide navigating through complex legal terrain. Her sterling capabilities make her a top-tier choice for any business requiring contract drafting or advice.
